flavorText: Abandoned at birth, the giant was raised by goats. Ironically, it grew up to be the most cautious member of the herd.

foreignData.flavorText: Der Riese wurde nach der Geburt ausgesetzt und von Ziegen aufgezogen. Ironischerweise wurde aus ihm das vorsichtigste Mitglied der Herde.
foreignData.name: Feiger Hüne
foreignData.text: Der Feige Hüne kann nicht alleine blocken.

foreignData.flavorText: Lo abandonaron al nacer y lo criaron las cabras. Irónicamente, se volvió el más cauto del rebaño.
foreignData.name: Titán cobarde
foreignData.text: El Titán cobarde no puede bloquear solo.

foreignData.flavorText: Abandonné à la naissance, le géant a été élevé par des chèvres. Paradoxalement, il est devenu le membre le plus prudent du troupeau.
foreignData.name: Carcasse veule
foreignData.text: La Carcasse veule ne peut pas bloquer seule.

foreignData.flavorText: Abbandonato alla nascita, il gigante venne allevato dalle capre. Per ironia della sorte, crescendo divenne il membro più cauto del gregge.
foreignData.name: Mole Codarda
foreignData.text: La Mole Codarda non può bloccare da sola.

foreignData.flavorText: 生まれてすぐに捨てられたその巨人はヤギに育てられた。皮肉なことに、成長したときには群れで一番用心深くなっていた。
foreignData.name: 臆病な大男
foreignData.text: 臆病な大男単独ではブロックできない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 巨人・臆病者

foreignData.flavorText: 그 거인은 태어날 때 버려져, 염소들에 의해 키워졌다. 역설적이게도, 무리 중에서 가장 조심스러운 구성원으로 자라났다.
foreignData.name: 겁 많은 거인
foreignData.text: 겁 많은 거인은 혼자서 방어할 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText: Abandonado ao nascer, o gigante fora criado por bodes. Ironicamente, ele se tornou o membro mais cauteloso da manada.
foreignData.name: Brutamontes Covarde
foreignData.text: Brutamontes Covarde não pode bloquear sozinho.

foreignData.flavorText: Брошенного в младенчестве великана воспитали козы. Забавно, что в конечном итоге он оказался самым осторожным участником стада.
foreignData.name: Малодушная Громадина
foreignData.text: Малодушная Громадина не может блокировать в одиночку.

foreignData.flavorText: 这巨人生来便被抛弃，此后便由山羊抚养至今。讽刺的是，长大后的他成了整个羊群中最小心的人。
foreignData.name: 怯懦巨汉
foreignData.text: 怯懦巨汉不能单独进行阻挡。

foreignData.flavorText: 這巨人生來便被拋棄，此後便由山羊撫養至今。諷刺的是，長大後的他成了整個羊群中最小心的人。
foreignData.name: 怯懦巨漢
foreignData.text: 怯懦巨漢不能單獨進行阻擋。

name: Craven Hulk

rulings.text: Although Craven Hulk can’t be the only creature you declare as a blocking creature, it can be the only creature that blocks any given attacking creature. Other blocking creatures don’t have to block the same creature Craven Hulk does.
If you control more than one Craven Hulk, they can all block together, even if no other creatures block.
Once Craven Hulk has been declared as a blocking creature, it will remain in combat even if all other blockers leave the battlefield or are otherwise removed from combat.
If an effect says that Craven Hulk blocks “if able,” and you control at least one other creature that is able to block, you must block with Craven Hulk and at least one other creature.
